corrly 2.0

matrixly Correlation matrix Plot using R Plotly

matrixly.Rd

matrixly Correlation matrix Plot using R Plotly

matrixly(data = NULL)

Arguments

data

is a Data Frame

Value

plot

Examples

matrixly(data = mtcars)
